text: The University of South Florida is a public university in Tampa, Florida. The university has about 45,713 students. It was founded in 1956. The current president of the university is Rhea Law. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bulls. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the American Athletic Conference. ==References== ==Other websites== *University of South Florida's Official website *South Florida Bulls' Official athletics website South Florida South Florida Category:Colleges and universities in Florida Category:Tampa, Florida
title: University of South Florida
